title: Allow use of connection properties in multi-command
author: benwa
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
If we could use certain connection properties (like name/hostname) in the multi-SSH (should it actually be called multi-command?), it could be useful.

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->
If, for example, you're connected to multiple switches, and wish to copy all of the configs to a location, you could do the following:

~~copy running-config sftp://user:pa...

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: I dont see any reason why we wouldn't be able to use the existing variable replacement engine used by the external tools. Shouldn't be too difficult to implement the changes you've proposed.
